snippet: Bassem Youssef, who came under scrutiny during Mohamed Morsi’s presidency, had his program suspended a week after mocking the ultranationalism and pro-military fervor gripping Egypt.
abstract: Bassem Youssef, who came under scrutiny during Mohamed Morsi’s presidency, had his program suspended a week after mocking the ultranationalism and pro-military fervor gripping Egypt.

headline.main: Egyptian Network Abruptly Suspends TV Satirist
